title: kandanEke malagane
sahitya:
kandanEke malagane kELele sakhi


anupallavi

  kAyaja janakakEnAyitu ivage yAvaLa drSTi tAgite


caraNam 1    kandanEke kaNNa muccane indu nIradaDadadalliruvane 
Enendaru mukhavetti nODane gOvinda bA endare bAya terevane
    caraNam 2    tanayanAgi dhare aLedane tanna jananiya kaNDare sErane 
munigaLende mauna piDidane ghaLa gOvu kAidAga kALi sOkitEne
    caraNam 3    summanEtake vrata keDisidane hamminindali khaDga piDidane 
janma janmagaLalli biDadaliruva nI bArO bomma purandara viTTala
